Reviews.Author: Polla9920
Reviews.Content: baltimore zoo gps hotel alittle scary sketchy surprise location hotel wasnt bad requested king bed smoking friendly front desk received stunk smoke fridge phone didnt operate contact front desk imagine unhappy cell phone called resolved 5 minutes provided nice amenities promised advertised manager friendly cooperative clean staff friendly hotel located short commute city stay mainly closer harbor pay

Reviews.Title: “Good value, location and service.”
Reviews.Author: kdr31859
Reviews.Content: looking close convention ctr cost effective located online clean beds tv shower heat decent continental breakfast price 15 min downtown greatly impressed realized id left called 2 weeks manager pat patel returned call 3 days received lost item mail id stay recommend

Reviews.Content: floor bathroom sticky shower curtain weird spots top tv looked liked left caramel apple service cleaned otherwise roomrate expected king beds available price

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the price, but not great.”

Reviews.Content: hotel value money leaves lot desired bad manager desk outside front door lobby reek smoke arrived stale smoke smell nonsmoking floor havent experienced hotel counter bathroom stuff silly inconvenience nonetheless housecleaning employees loud morning music sounded wireless radios granted sleeping late hotel usually expect employees respectful guests exactly sleep sloppily finished maintained especially comfortable stay obviously price free wireless internet nice sized minifridge free parking location safe lot baltimore conveniently located highway
